author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Plus500 Ltd Says Plus500sg Pte. Ltd Granted Commodity Broker's Licence In Singapore‍​
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Plus500 Ltd:
* INTERNATIONAL ENTERPRISE SINGAPORE HAS GRANTED PLUS500SG PTE. LTD A COMMODITY BROKER‘S LICENCE IN SINGAPORE‍​
* ‍CBL WILL SUPPLEMENT CAPITAL MARKETS SERVICES LICENCE GRANTED TO PLUS500SG BY MONETARY AUTHORITY OF SINGAPORE IN DECEMBER 2017
* ‍CBL IS EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY AND IS VALID FOR ONE YEAR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
